title: Suggestion: filter matchmaking by surrender tendency
body:
Tilting three people by forcing them to get crushed repeatedly for an extra 10-15 minutes is absurd, and tilting someone by stealing a win out from under them when they were confident in a turnaround strategy is also absurd.

It makes more sense to have an entire team on board with either surrendering or fighting to the end. Grouping like-minded players would improve the game.

replies.body: So, at bronze, the queue time would be 20 minutes because all the bronzes surrender at 15 minutes.
